compression



c_compress_bound

size_t c_compress_bound(size_t size);
type: C function
description: get compression bound of size

c_compress

bool   c_compress(const byte_array src, byte_array dst, size_t *compressed_size);
type: C function
description: compress src to dst WARNING dst array must be big enough

c_uncompressed_size

size_t c_uncompressed_size(const byte_array compressed);
type: C function
description: get size of compressed byte array

c_uncompress

bool   c_uncompress(const byte_array src, byte_array dst);
type: C function
description: uncompress src to dst WARNING dst array must be big enough

c_gzip_file

bool   c_gzip_file(const char *in, const char *out);
type: C function
description: gzip a file

c_ungzip_file

bool   c_ungzip_file(const char *in, const char *out);
type: C function
description: ungzip a file
